languages.text: Преподобный Иеронимус обернулся против Лорд-капитана. Это дерзкое выступление должно быть подавлено, а слушающие проповедника фанатики — казнены.

traits.locale_text: Преподобный Иеронимус обернулся против вас, не приняв судьбу Инцендии — победите его.

languages.text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.
languages.original_text: Преподобный Иеронимус обернулся против Лорд-капитана. Это дерзкое выступление должно быть подавлено, а слушающие проповедника фанатики — казнены.

traits.locale_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical listeners executed.
Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical listeners executed.
Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.
Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

languages.text: Le révérend Hiéronymus s'est retourné contre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Cet affront doit être lavé et sa congrégation fanatique, exécutée.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

traits.locale_text: Le révérend Hiéronymus s'est retourné contre {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. Cet affront doit être lavé et sa congrégation fanatique, exécutée.

languages.text: 希罗尼穆斯牧师背叛了行商浪人。必须制止这种一意孤行的行为，将他所有的狂热信徒统统处决。
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

traits.locale_text: 希罗尼穆斯牧师背叛了行商浪人。必须制止这种一意孤行的行为，将他所有的狂热信徒统统处决。

languages.text: ヒエロニムス司祭はロード・キャプテンに反旗を翻した。この厚かましい行為を制圧し、狂信的な信者らを処刑する必要がある。
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムス司祭はロード・キャプテンに反旗を翻した。この厚かましい行為を制圧し、狂信的な信者らを処刑する必要がある。

languages.text: Reverend Hieronymus hat sich gegen den Lord Captain gestellt. Diese Dreistigkeit muss unterbunden werden, seine fanatischen Anhänger müssen hingerichtet werden.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

traits.locale_text: Reverend Hieronymus hat sich gegen den Lord Captain gestellt. Diese Dreistigkeit muss unterbunden werden, seine fanatischen Anhänger müssen hingerichtet werden.

languages.text: El reverendo Hieronymus se ha vuelto contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es necesario contener este arrebato y ejecutar a su caterva de fanáticos.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.

traits.locale_text: El reverendo Hieronymus se ha vuelto contra {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Es necesario contener este arrebato y ejecutar a su caterva de fanáticos.

languages.text: Muhterem Hieronymus, Lord Kaptan'a sırtını döndü. Bu arsız hareketini ona ödetmek ve fanatik kurultaycılarını ortadan kaldırmak gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: Reverend Hieronymus has turned against the Lord Captain. This brazen display needs to be subdued and his fanatical congregation executed.
